/Lotus/Language/Game/DayCommonPlantDesc: This common plant can only be found during the day.
/Lotus/Language/Game/DayUnCommonPlantDes: This uncommon plant can only be found during the day.
/Lotus/Language/Game/DayRarePlantDesc: This rare plant can only be found during the day.
/Lotus/Language/Game/NightCommonPlantDes: This common plant can only be found at night.
/Lotus/Language/Game/NightUnCommonPlantD: This uncommon plant can only be found at night.
/Lotus/Language/Game/NightRarePlantDesc: This rare plant can only be found at night.
/Lotus/Language/Game/HyenaIceDesc: Strong Melee attacks with a Slow Aura
/Lotus/Language/Game/HyenaFireDesc: Heavy AoE attacks with a Fire Resistance Aura
/Lotus/Language/Game/HyenaElecDesc: Charging attacks with a Power Drain and HUD Scrambling Aura
/Lotus/Language/Game/HyenaGunDesc: Long range attacks with Shield Recharge Aura
/Lotus/Language/Game/LeaderFireDesc: Grants fire and explosion resistance to nearby allies
/Lotus/Language/Game/LeaderIceDesc: Grants cold resistance to nearby allies and slows enemies
/Lotus/Language/Game/LeaderMagDesc: Grants electric resistance to nearby allies and scrambles the HUD of Tenno
/Lotus/Language/Game/LeaderToxicDesc: Grants Poison resistance to nearby allies
/Lotus/Language/Game/SuicideDroneDesc: Charges its target and detonates when threatened
/Lotus/Language/Game/DeathSquadDesc: A member of the infamous Grustrag Three
/Lotus/Language/Game/WardenLeaderDesc: Life leech weapon, increased speed, weak to stealth attacks
/Lotus/Language/Game/HekPropDroneDesc: Boosts Grineer morale while weakening enemies
/Lotus/Language/Game/KillEnemiesWithinTi: Kill |COUNT| enemies - melee orbs for extra time!
/Lotus/Language/Game/KubrowLongDesc: After the fall of the Orokin, these former pets were left to fend for themselves. Only the most vicious survived, evolving into deadly pack hunters that now pervade every inch of Earth's dense forest. Intensely territorial, the Kubrow will attack any creature unlucky enough to cross their path.
/Lotus/Language/Game/KubrowDenLongDesc: Fiercely guarded by their owners, the Kubrow den is capable of housing an entire pack of the feral creatures. Once disturbed, these animals will whip themselves into a frenzy attacking anything they deem a threat.
/Lotus/Language/GameTips/HeavyMeleeDesc_:
Hold <NEXT_INV> to holster your current weapon, and draw your melee weapon.
You can switch back to your firearms by holding <NEXT_INV>
/Lotus/Language/IRC/G_MOTD:
Welcome, Tenno.
Be respectful.
No profanity.
No spamming.
Only Recruit in â€œRecruitingâ€ Channel.
/Lotus/Language/IRC/R_MOTD: Recruit for a Squad or Clan here!
/Lotus/Language/IRC/D_MOTD:
Honorable Design Council, welcome to your private channel. 
Master and Grandmaster Founders gather here to discuss Warframe. Recruiting here is discouraged for connectivity reasons. 
Note: We at [DE] speak English and weâ€™d prefer English discussion so we can participate.
/Lotus/Language/IRC/T_MOTD:
Trading is done within the Dojo at a Trading Post
You can invite non-members of your clan to your Dojo to trade
Trading is currently limited to: MODS, KEYS, PLATINUM, and PRIME BLUEPRINTS/PARTS.  

We do not enforce trades for promises, clan membership, and other favors. Trade for items only.
/Lotus/Language/Items/DayCommonSampleDes: A sample take from a common day-time plant.
/Lotus/Language/Items/DayUnCommonSampleD: A sample taken from an uncommon day-time plant.
/Lotus/Language/Items/DayRareSampleDesc: A sample taken from a rare day-time plant.
/Lotus/Language/Items/NightCommonSampleD: A sample taken from a common night-time plant.
/Lotus/Language/Items/NightUnCommonSampl: A sample taken from an uncommon night-time plant.
/Lotus/Language/Items/NightRareSampleDes: A sample taken from a rare night-time plant.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ExcaliburDesc: A perfect balance of mobility and offense, Excalibur is the ideal Warframe for new players.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ExcaliburPrimeDesc: Excalibur Prime is the epitome of mobility and offense, and features the same abilities as Excalibur, but has unique mod polarities installed allowing for greater customization.
/Lotus/Language/Items/RhinoDesc: Rhino is the heaviest Warframe, combining offensive and defensive capabilities.
/Lotus/Language/Items/MagDesc: With full command of surrounding magnetic energy, Mag is an expert at enemy manipulation.
/Lotus/Language/Items/MagPrimeDesc: The exquisite Mag Prime offers the same abilities as Mag but with unique mod polarities for greater customization.
/Lotus/Language/Items/TrinityDesc: Trinity is great for players who prefer a supportive role. Warframes with healing technology are rare making Trinity a great equalizer when the odds are stacked against the Tenno.
/Lotus/Language/Items/NinjaDesc: Ash is great for players looking for a stealthier approach to combat. Lethal abilities are complemented by powers of distraction.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FrostPrimeDesc: Frost Prime has the same chilling abilities as Frost but its altered mod polarities offer different possibilities for customization. It is also rumored that this Warframe has a unique reaction to certain Orokin technology.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FrostDesc: By channeling moisture and vapor in the surrounding environment, Frost creates formidable defenses and lethal attacks from sub zero conditions.
/Lotus/Language/Items/VoltDesc: Volt can create and harness electrical elements. This is a high-damage Warframe perfect for players who want a potent alternative to gun-play.
/Lotus/Language/Items/EmberDesc: Ember is a nightmare for light-armored targets. Ember can super-heat the air which opens up surprising crowd-control possibilities.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AspDesc: Saryn's venomous attacks are horrifyingly effective against organic and synthetic enemies, and her ability to 'shed' her skin makes her very elusive.
/Lotus/Language/Items/JadeDesc: Mind control and psychic attacks make Nyx a very dangerous foe. Her ability to reach into enemy consciousness and manipulate their behavior can turn the tide of battle.
/Lotus/Language/Items/lokiDesc: Desired by advanced players, Loki offers a variety of specialized reconfiguring abilities. The creativity of Loki's powers allows players to master the battlefield through manipulation.
/Lotus/Language/Items/PlasmaGrenadeDesc: The plasma grenade is a simple but very high yield explosive. Sticks to surfaces after being thrown.
/Lotus/Language/Items/PlayerMeleeBuffEle: Adds lightning damage to melee weapons
/Lotus/Language/Items/ScatterGrenadeDesc: The scatter grenade is a medium yield explosive that hurls out several other small explosives on detonation.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AffinityBoosterDes: Doubles the rate at which you earn affinity. Upgrade your weapons and Warframes faster. Available as a 3 or 7 day booster.
/Lotus/Language/Items/RenownBoosterDesc: News of your deeds and actions spread faster with this active.  Your progress towards player renown level-ups is doubled.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AkimboPistolDesc: A Lato equipped in each hand. Twice the clip size and fire rate, but reload time is doubled and accuracy is lowered.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AkimboBoltoDesc: A Bolto equipped in each hand. Twice the clip size and fire rate, but reload time is doubled and accuracy is lowered.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AkimboAutoPistolDe: Furis pistols equipped in each hand. Twice the clip size and fire rate, but reload time is doubled and accuracy is lowered.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AkimboViperPistolD: A Viper equipped in each hand.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AutoPistolDesc: The Furis delivers a high damage output in a short time frame thanks to its high rate of fire.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BurstPistolDesc: The Sicarus fires 3-round bursts, which provides a balance between the lethality of auto-pistols and the accuracy of semi-automatic pistols.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CrossBoltDesc: The Bolto fires slow, heavy bolts that are capable of impaling enemies to walls.
/Lotus/Language/Items/HandCannonDesc: The Bronco is a small-scale shotgun that can be wielded with one hand. Only effective at close range, it has a limited clip size.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BurstRifleDesc: The Burston fires 3-round bursts, which provides a balance between the lethality of automatic rifles and the accuracy of semi-automatic rifles.
/Lotus/Language/Items/PistolDesc: The Lato is a highly accurate pistol used by the Tenno everywhere.
/Lotus/Language/Items/LatoPrimeDesc: The Lato is a highly accurate pistol used by the Tenno everywhere. Prime model offers slightly increased damage.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ShotgunDesc: The Strun is a standard shotgun. Reliable, versatile and deadly.
/Lotus/Language/Items/StrunVandalDesc: A different take on a familiar shotgun, the Strun Wraith features unique styling.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AutoShotgunDesc: A shotgun with low accuracy and strong recoil, but able to deliver its payload in full-auto. The Boar is best used at close range.
/Lotus/Language/Items/RifleDesc: The Braton's high rate of fire and accuracy make it a favorite among the Tenno.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BoltoRifleDesc: The Boltor fires slow, heavy bolts that are capable of impaling enemies to walls.
/Lotus/Language/Items/StartingRifleDesc: The MK1-Braton is the standard issue rifle for all Tenno. A versatile weapon that can be customized to support a wide variety of play styles.
/Lotus/Language/Items/VIPRifleDesc: A special version of the standard Braton rifle with a slower fire rate but offering higher accuracy and damage values. The Braton Vandal has been customized by the Tenno with a blue-green metallic finish and Lotus branding on the grips.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SemiAutoRifleDesc: The Latron is a highly efficient rifle that performs well at medium and at long range, its accuracy making it a deadly weapon in the hands of skilled marksmen.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SniperRifleDesc: Manufactured by the Corpus, the Snipetron is a powerful and accurate rifle that sports optical zoom capabilities. Perfect for long range engagements.
/Lotus/Language/Items/HeavyRifleDesc: The Gorgon sports a large clip that allows it to provide suppressing fire and sustain a high damage rate over a long time. Its high fire rate is only achieved following a short wind-up cycle.
/Lotus/Language/Items/IncendiaryBallisti: The Incendiary Ballistic Enhancer increases your ballistic weapon damage by a small percentage.  The extra damage is incendiary damage, which is effective against flesh.
/Lotus/Language/Items/IceBallisticEnhanc: The Frost Ballistic Enhancer increases your ballistic weapon damage by a small percentage.  The extra damage is frost damage, which is effective against robotics.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ShockBallisticEnha: The Shock Ballistic Enhancer increases your ballistic weapon damage by a small percentage.  The extra damage is shock damage, which is effective against shields.
/Lotus/Language/Items/WeaponUpgradePlace: Missing Loc tag! Please create a loc tag for this upgrade in Items.loc
/Lotus/Language/Items/SelfReviveDesc: Recovers you from the knocked down state.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SelfShieldDesc: Instantly restores 150 shield, even if your shields have been completely depleted.
/Lotus/Language/Items/TeamHealDesc: Restores HEALTH to all team members
/Lotus/Language/Items/TeamAmmoDesc: Restores AMMO to all team members
/Lotus/Language/Items/TeamEnergyDesc: Restores ENERGY to all team members
/Lotus/Language/Items/TeamShieldDesc: Restores SHIELDS for all team members
/Lotus/Language/Items/TeamArmoryDesc: Infinite clip size for all team members
/Lotus/Language/Items/ClanTeamHealDesc: Restores HEALTH to all team members in greater quantities
/Lotus/Language/Items/ClanTeamAmmoDesc: Restores AMMO to all team members in greater quantities
/Lotus/Language/Items/ClanTeamEnergyDesc: Restores ENERGY to all team members in greater quantities
/Lotus/Language/Items/ClanTeamShieldDesc: Restores SHIELDS for all team members in greater quantities
/Lotus/Language/Items/DamageDebuffKeyDes: Damage is greatly reduced while key is equipped.
/Lotus/Language/Items/HealthDebuffKeyDes: Health is greatly reduced while key is equipped.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ShieldDebuffKeyDes: Shields are greatly reduced while key is equipped.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SpeedDebuffKeyDesc: Speed is greatly reduced while key is equipped.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ResurrectionUpgrad: An automatic self-revive if the player would have otherwise died.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BulletAttractorAbi: Magnetizes a target, causing passing bullets to seek the target. Field detonates if target dies.
Boosting this ability increases the area of the magnetic field.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AbsorbAbilityDesc: Nyx absorbs all incoming damage and channels that collected energy into an explosive radial discharge.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AbsorbAbilityBoost: Boost the amount of damage you can absorb.
/Lotus/Language/Items/PhysicDaggerAbilit: Nyx launches a cluster of force bolts at enemies, using telekinesis to adjust flight paths and seek nearby targets.
Boost the number of daggers thrown
/Lotus/Language/Items/ChaosAbilityDesc: With a powerful psychic blast, Nyx causes mass hysteria on the battlefield by confusing all enemies to attack random factions.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ChaosAbilityBoost: Boost the range of the chaos you create.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FreezeAbilityDesc: A frigid energy blast that freezes targets in their tracks.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FreezeAbilityBoost: Boost the amount of damage done with Freeze.
/Lotus/Language/Items/IceWaveAbilityDesc: Sends a wave of razor sharp, crystalized ice toward an enemy, dealing heavy damage.
/Lotus/Language/Items/IceWaveAbilityBoos: Boost the distance your Ice Wave travels
/Lotus/Language/Items/SnowGlobeAbilityDe: Frost deep freezes any vapor and moisture in the surrounding area to create an impenetrable sphere of protection.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SnowGlobeAbilityBo: Increases the amount by which enemies touching your snow globe are slowed.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AvalancheAbilityDe: Summons a treacherous landslide of ice that instantly freezes and shatters all enemies in its radius.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AvalancheAbilityBo: Increase the range of your Avalanche.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CrushAbilityDesc: Magnetizes the bones of nearby enemies, causing them to collapse upon themselves.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CrushAbilityBoost: Boosting this ability increases its range.
/Lotus/Language/Items/DecoyAbilityBoost: Boosting this ability increases the lifetime of the decoy.
/Lotus/Language/Items/DecoyAbilityDesc: Loki deploys a holographic copy of himself, drawing enemy fire.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FireBallAbilityBoo: Boosting this ability increases the initial impact damage and the duration of the lingering flames.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FireBallAbilityDes: Launches a fiery projectile.  It deals high fire damage on contact and moderate fire damage to any who enter the lingering flames.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FireBlastAbilityBo: Boosting this ability increases the initial slam damage and the duration of the fire ring.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FireBlastAbilityDe: Slams the ground for high damage in a small radius and creates a persistent ring of fire which deals high damage over time.
/Lotus/Language/Items/GlaiveAbilityBoost: Boosting this ability greatly increases the damage dealt.
/Lotus/Language/Items/GlaiveAbilityDesc: Launches a spinning blade of pain, dealing high damage and impaling enemies to walls.
/Lotus/Language/Items/InvisibilityAbilit: Boosting this ability increases its duration.
Loki camouflages himself, becoming invisible to enemies.
/Lotus/Language/Items/IronSkinAbilityBoo: Boosting this ability increases its duration.
/Lotus/Language/Items/IronSkinAbilityDes: Rhino hardens his skin, insulating himself from all damage.
/Lotus/Language/Items/MindControlAbility: Nyx invades the psyche of a target, confusing enemies and making them fight for the Tenno cause.
/Lotus/Language/Items/NinjaStormAbilityB: Boosting this ability increases its area of effect and maximum number of targets.
/Lotus/Language/Items/NinjaStormAbilityD: Ash goes on a rampage, teleporting to and destroying nearby enemies.
/Lotus/Language/Items/DojoKeyDescription: Unlocks access to your Clan's Dojo
/Lotus/Language/Items/OrokinKeyADescript: An Exterminate mission within the Void
/Lotus/Language/Items/OrokinKeyBDescript: A Raid mission within the Void
/Lotus/Language/Items/OrokinKeyCDescript: An Exterminate mission within the Void
/Lotus/Language/Items/OrokinKeyDDescript: A Raid mission within the Void
/Lotus/Language/Items/OrokinKeyFDescript: A Defense mission within the Void
/Lotus/Language/Items/OrokinKeyGDescript: A Defense mission within the Void
/Lotus/Language/Items/OrokinKeyHDescript: A Defense mission within the Void
/Lotus/Language/Items/OrokinKeyEDescript: An Exterminate mission within the Void
/Lotus/Language/Items/VoidKeyDesc: A key that grants access to missions within the Void
/Lotus/Language/Items/RandomKeyDesc: 5 Random Void Keys, one guaranteed Rare Key. What secret missions exist within the Void?
/Lotus/Language/Items/OverLoadAbilityBoo: Boosting this ability increases its area of effect.
/Lotus/Language/Items/OverLoadAbilityDes: Volt emits an energy field, destroying lights and other electronics which will violently explode and damage enemies.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ProtectAbilityDesc: Engulfs a target ally in an impregnable stasis field, preventing damage and slowing player bleedout.
/Lotus/Language/Items/PullAbilityBoost: Boosting this ability increases its range.
/Lotus/Language/Items/PullAbilityDesc: Magnetic force pulls enemies toward you, stunning them and bringing them into melee range.
/Lotus/Language/Items/RadialBlastAbility: Boosting this ability increases the damage dealt and the area of effect.
Warframe punches the ground, dealing high damage to enemies in a small radius.
/Lotus/Language/Items/RadialJavelinAbili: Boosting this ability increases its area of effect and the number of javelins that are fired.
Launches javelins towards enemies, dealing high damage and impaling them to walls.
/Lotus/Language/Items/RadialBlindAbility: Boosting this ability increases its area of effect and the duration of blindness.
Emits a bright flash of light, blinding all enemies in a small radius for several seconds.
/Lotus/Language/Items/RadialDisarmAbilit: Boosting this ability increases its area of effect.
Lets forth a wave of energy, disrupting the projectile weapons of enemies in range and forcing them to revert to melee combat.
/Lotus/Language/Items/RadialHealAbilityD: Provides a small healing effect for allies in a large radius.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ResurrectAbilityDe: Revives all allies who have been knocked down, and resurrects any allies who have died.
/Lotus/Language/Items/RhinoChargeAbility: Boosting this ability increases the length of the charge, damage dealt and area of effect at the end.
Rhino charges towards a target, clobbering any in his path and goring his victim.
/Lotus/Language/Items/RhinoStompAbilityB: Boosting this ability increases its area of effect and the damage dealt.
/Lotus/Language/Items/RhinoStompAbilityD: Rhino stomps with force sufficient to disrupt time, tumbling enemies around him in stasis.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ShieldRegenAbility: Boosting this ability increases its range and improves the amount of shield restored or drained.
Restores or depletes the shields of surrounding targets, depending if they are friend or foe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ShieldAbilityBoost: Boosting this ability increases the life-time of the shield.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ShieldAbilityDesc: Volt deploys an obstacle of energy, providing cover in any situation.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ShockAbilityBoost: Boosting this ability increases the damage dealt.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ShockAbilityDesc: Launches a shocking projectile.  It stuns and deals high damage to a single target and chains damage to nearby enemies.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SmokeScreenAbility: Boosting this ability increases the duration of the invisibility.
Drops a smoke bomb that stuns enemies and obscures their vision, rendering Ash invisible for a short time.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SpeedAbilityBoost: Boosting this ability increases its duration.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SpeedAbilityDesc: Volt energizes his body and nearby Warframes, giving them increased speed and dexterity for a short time.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SuperJumpAbilityBo: Boosting this ability increases the jump height.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SuperJumpAbilityDe: Excalibur launches into the air, jumping 3 times higher than normal.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SwitchTeleportAbil: Loki instantaneously swaps positions with a target, confusing the enemy.
/Lotus/Language/Items/TeleportToAbilityB: Boosting this ability increases its range.
/Lotus/Language/Items/TeleportToAbilityD: Ash teleports towards the target, bringing them into melee range.
/Lotus/Language/Items/WorldOnFireAbility: Boosting this ability increases the duration and area of effect.
/Lotus/Language/Items/OverheatAbilityBoo: Boosting this ability increases its duration and damage.
/Lotus/Language/Items/OverheatAbilityDes: Stun nearby enemies with strong accelerant. Increases all fire damage dealt.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SlashDashAbilityBo: Boosting this ability increases the distance traveled and damage dealt.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SlashDashAbilityDe: Excalibur dashes forward, slashing any who get in his way.
/Lotus/Language/Items/DarkDaggerDesc: This short blade weapon forged using dark metals has limited range but comes out fast.
/Lotus/Language/Items/HeatSwordDesc: A strong blade capable of inflicting fire damage to its foes.
/Lotus/Language/Items/PlasmaSwordDesc: An advanced blade that delivers high-damage charge attacks. Delivers a high percentage of critical strikes.
/Lotus/Language/Items/PangolinSwordDesc: A unique blade used by an old Tenno clan.
/Lotus/Language/Items/JawSwordDesc: A blade with a serrated edge that delivers strong quick attacks.
/Lotus/Language/Items/DarkSwordDesc: A blade forged using dark metals, capable of delivering high-damage charge attacks.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CeramicDaggerDesc: This short blade weapon was built using ceramic. It has limited range but comes out fast.
/Lotus/Language/Items/HeatDaggerDesc: This short blade weapon has limited range but comes out fast and can inflict fire damage.
/Lotus/Language/Items/LongSwordDesc: Before all other weapons, Tenno master the Skana. This simple blade becomes immensely powerful in the hands of a master. For Tenno, it is the foundation of their fighting style and a pillar of their culture.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SkanaPrimeDesc: A basic blade known as a Skana. It is widely used by the Tenno. Prime model offers slightly increased damage.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CronusSwordDesc: A strong blade forged using ceramic.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FinSwordDesc: An enigmatic blade of unknown origin. Delivers a high percentage of critical strikes.
/Lotus/Language/Items/DualShortSwordDesc: A shorter Skana in each hand. Can hit multiple targets.
/Lotus/Language/Items/DualEtherSwordDesc: Fast and precise. The Ether Sword cuts so cleanly that it was considered by the Tenno to be a more humane weapon for â€˜cleansingâ€™ infested allies. Capable of hitting multiple targets.
/Lotus/Language/Items/DualAxeDesc: Short axes held in each hand. High attack speed and can hit multiple targets. Delivers a high percentage of critical strikes.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FemaleSuitPackDesc: Unlock Mag, Trinity, and Ember Warframes.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FemaleSuitPackBDes: Unlock Saryn, Banshee and Nyx Warframes.
/Lotus/Language/Items/RhinoSuitPackDesc: Unlock Rhino and his favorite gear.
/Lotus/Language/Items/LokiSuitPackDesc: Unlock Loki and his favorite gear.
/Lotus/Language/Items/RoboticsPackDesc: All 3 types of robotics for one low price.
/Lotus/Language/Items/PistolPackDesc: For those who like their weapons small.  Contains four standard ballistic sidearms.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ConsumablesPackDes: A collection of restorative items to keep you and your teammates alive.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ElectricPackDesc: Get Volt and all his favorite gear.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FrostPackDesc: Get Frost and all his favorite gear.
/Lotus/Language/Items/JadePackDesc: Get Nyx and all her favorite gear.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CipherDesc: Single-use device used for auto-hacking the lockdown control panels.

/Lotus/Language/Items/AvatarNekrosArakni: An profile icon depicting Raknis Nekros on a dark background.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ColourPickerADescr: Unlocks additional color options for Warframe customization.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ColourPickerBDescr: More saturated color options for Warframe customization.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ColourPickerCDescr: Unlocks additional color options for Warframe customization.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ShamrockColorPicke: Unlocks additional color options for Warframe customization.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ColourPickerDDescr: Unlocks additional color options for Warframe customization.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ColourPickerDefaul: Unlocks additional color options reflecting the default colors used on each standard Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ColourPickerIceADe: Cool off with these additional color options for Warframe customization.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ColourPickerFireAD: Unlocks additional color options for Warframe customization.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ColourPickerValADe: Unlocks a collection of lovely colors.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ColourPickerEasADe: Unlocks a collection of lovely EASTER colors.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ColourPickerInfest: Unlocks a collection of colors inspired by Infested denizens.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ColourPickerHallow: Unlocks a collection of Ghastly Greens, Pumpkin Orange and Blood Red colors to customize your Warframe with.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ColourPickerGrinee: Unlocks a collection of colors inspired by Grineer marines.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ColourPickerRWBDes: Unlocks a collection of patriotic colors.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ColourPickerBastil: Unlocks a collection of symbolic colors, found in datamass detailing the record of an ancient battle.
/Lotus/Language/Items/StaffDesc: A two-handed, reinforced staff that can send multiple enemies airborne.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ReviveBoosterDesc: Grants 4 free revives per match when active.
/Lotus/Language/Items/WellOfLifeAbilityB: Boosting this ability increases its duration and the health leech percentage.
/Lotus/Language/Items/WellOfLifeAbilityD: Create a well of life on an enemy. Allies will gain health when damaging the target.
/Lotus/Language/Items/EnergyVampireAbili: Boosting this ability increases its duration and the energy leech percentage.
Allies will gain energy over time when enemies are marked with Energy Vampire.
/Lotus/Language/Items/LinkAbilityBoost: Boosting this ability increases its duration.
/Lotus/Language/Items/LinkAbilityDesc: Any damage taken while Link is active will be channeled to a nearby enemy.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BlessingAbilityDes: Restores the health and shields of all allies, while simultaneously providing a degree of damage immunity to the team. The greater the healing the greater the immunity.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BlessingAbilityBoo: Boosting this ability increases the duration of the invulnerability.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FistDesc: These power gauntlets lack the range of most melee weapons, but Furax is far more devastating when you strike an enemy in close combat.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BrassKnucklesDesc: These coverings for the hands and feet allow devastating high flying hand-to-hand combat attacks without risking harm to the user.
/Lotus/Language/Items/HeavyPistolDesc: The Lex is a powerful, accurate pistol that has a low fire rate and clip size. Very efficient at long range.
/Lotus/Language/Items/PlayerHolsterSpeed: Increases weapon holstering and unholstering speed
/Lotus/Language/Items/AlloyPlateDesc: Carbon steel plates used to reinforce Grineer armor.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SalvageDesc: High value metals collected from war salvage.
/Lotus/Language/Items/OrokinCellDesc: Ancient energy cell from the Orokin era.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArgonCrystalDesc: Void based radioactive resource that decays every day it is out of the void.
/Lotus/Language/Items/OrokinCatalystDesc: Orokin modification technology used to super-charge weaponry. Doubles the available Mod Capacity on a Weapon.
/Lotus/Language/Items/OrokinReactorDesc: Reactor used to super-charge Warframes. Doubles the available Mod Capacity on a Warframe or Sentinel.
/Lotus/Language/Items/RubedoDesc: A jagged crystalline ore. Gives off radiant energy.
/Lotus/Language/Items/PolymerBundleDesc: A hard, thermoplastic casing. Manufactured by Corpus.
/Lotus/Language/Items/NeurodeDesc: Implanted neural-link for controlling augmentations. Grineer design.
/Lotus/Language/Items/NeuralSensorDesc: Biotech sensor organ harvested from Infested entities.
/Lotus/Language/Items/NanosporesDesc: Fibrous technocyte tumour. Handle Infested tissue with caution.
/Lotus/Language/Items/MorphicDesc: An amorphous solid. Possibly Orokin technology.
/Lotus/Language/Items/NavCodeDesc: Coordinate used to locate lost ships.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BossNavCodeDesc: Coordinate used to locate the Golem.
/Lotus/Language/Items/HekNavCodeDesc: Coordinate used to locate Councilor Vay Hek [obsolete??]
/Lotus/Language/Items/GalliumDesc: Soft metal used in microelectronics and energy weapons.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FerriteDesc: Alloy pellets used in Grineer manufacturing.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ControlModuleDesc: Autonomy processor for Robotics. A Corpus design.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FormaDesc: This shape-altering component is fundamental to Orokin construction. Allows you to change the polarity of a mod slot on a Warframe, Sentinel or Weapon and then resets their affinity to Level 1. This can only be used on Level 30 Warframes, Sentinels and Weapons.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ActuatorDesc: Synthetic tensor components. Used in the manufacture of Corpus Robotics.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CreditBoosterDesc: Doubles the amount of credits you get from pickups
/Lotus/Language/Items/ResourceAmountBoos: Doubles the amount of resources you get from pickups
/Lotus/Language/Items/GoodStuffDropChanc: Doubles the chance to drop good items
/Lotus/Language/Items/ModDropChanceBoost: Doubles the chance of mod drops
/Lotus/Language/Items/ResourceDropChance: Doubles the chance of resource drops
/Lotus/Language/Items/SelfPistolAmmoDesc: Restores a bunch of pistol ammo.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SelfRifleAmmoDesc: Restores a bunch of rifle ammo.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SelfShotgunAmmoDes: Restores a bunch of shotgun ammo.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SelfSniperAmmoDesc: Restores a bunch of sniper ammo.
/Lotus/Language/Items/HeavyAxeDesc: The Scindo is a heavy war axe crafted by the Tenno. Reduced speed and agility is balanced by heavy, devastating strikes capable of connecting with multiple targets at once.
/Lotus/Language/Items/HammerDesc: A large two-handed hammer, the Fragor requires great strength to wield, but impacts with enough force to send groups of enemies tumbling.
/Lotus/Language/Items/GreatSwordDesc: The heavy two-handed sword known as Gram requires great strength to wield, but it is notorious for its splitting power. Can hit multiple targets with each strike.
/Lotus/Language/Items/TennoGreatSwordDes: With massive charged power and the ability to hit up to five foes in a single swing, the Galatine sword is the heavy artillery of melee weapons.
/Lotus/Language/Items/DualHeatSwordDesc: With a Heat Sword in each hand, enemies reach their fiery demise twice as fast. Can connect with multiple targets at once.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ExcaliburPrimeAlab: An alternate body skin for Excalibur Prime
/Lotus/Language/Items/EmberDefaultHelmet: The standard issue helmet for the Ember warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/EmberAltHelmetDesc: Phoenix Helmet for the Ember Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcaneEmberAltHelm: Phoenix reduces shields in order to boost energy capacity.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CreditBundleADesc: By purchasing this item you can directly exchange 30<PLATINUM_CREDITS>(Platinum) for 9000<CREDITS>(Credits).
/Lotus/Language/Items/CreditBundleBDesc: By purchasing this item you can directly exchange 60<PLATINUM_CREDITS>(Platinum) for 25000<CREDITS>(Credits).
/Lotus/Language/Items/CreditBundleCDesc: By purchasing this item you can directly exchange 90<PLATINUM_CREDITS>(Platinum) for 30000<CREDITS>(Credits).
/Lotus/Language/Items/NecroDefaultHelmet: The standard issue helmet for the Nekros warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/NecroScarfDesc: Only Nekros is permitted to wear the Mortos Syandana.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ExcaliburDefaultHe: The standard issue helmet for the Excalibur warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ExcaliburAltHelmet: Avalon Helmet for the Excalibur Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcaneExcaliburAlt: Avalon increases shields at the expense of health.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FrostDefaultHelmet: The standard issue helmet for the Frost warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FrostAltHelmetDesc: Aurora Helmet for the Frost Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcaneFrostAltHelm: Aurora increases armour at the expense of health.
/Lotus/Language/Items/JadeDefaultHelmetD: The standard issue helmet for the Nyx warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/JadeAltHelmetDesc: Menticide Helmet for the Nyx Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcaneJadeAltHelme: Menticide increases stamina with a drain on shields.
/Lotus/Language/Items/LokiDefaultHelmetD: The standard issue helmet for the Loki warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/LokiAltHelmetDesc: Essence Helmet for the Loki Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcaneLokiAltHelme: Essence increases power efficiency, but reduces armor rating.
/Lotus/Language/Items/MagDefaultHelmetDe: The standard issue helmet for the Mag warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/MagAltHelmetDesc: Coil Helmet for the Mag Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcaneMagAltHelmet: Coil gives increased power range with a drain on shields.
/Lotus/Language/Items/NinjaDefaultHelmet: The standard issue helmet for the Ash warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/NinjaAltHelmetDesc: Scorpion Helmet for the Ash Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcaneNinjaAltHelm: Scorpion increases stamina while sacrificing power efficiency.
/Lotus/Language/Items/RhinoAltHelmetDesc: Thrak Helmet for the Rhino Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcaneRhinoAltHelm: Thrak increases health but reduces sprint speed.
/Lotus/Language/Items/TrapperDefaultHelm: The standard issue helmet for the Vauban warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/TrapperAltHelmetDe: Esprit Helmet for the Vauban Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcaneTrapperAltHe: Esprit increases power max with a reduction to shields.
/Lotus/Language/Items/TrinityDefaultHelm: The standard issue helmet for the Trinity warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/TrinityAltHelmetDe: Aura Helmet for the Trinity Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcaneTrinityAltHe: Aura increases the power duration but adversely affects health.
/Lotus/Language/Items/VoltDefaultHelmetD: The standard issue helmet for the Volt warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/VoltAltHelmetDesc: Storm Helmet for the Volt Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcaneVoltAltHelme: Storm increases ability power but reduces stamina.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ExcaliburPrimeHelm: The standard issue helmet for the Excalibur Prime Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FrostPrimeHelmetDe: The standard issue helmet for the Frost Prime Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/MagPrimeHelmetDesc: The standard issue helmet for the Mag Prime Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/GrineerHeavyPistol: The Kraken is a heavy pistol of Grineer design that fires quick two shots  with a single pull of the trigger. Skilled marksmen will appreciate the value in this deadly accurate weapon.
/Lotus/Language/Items/DaggerAxeSkinDesc: Replaces the edges of the Scindo with multiple Rubedo blades.
/Lotus/Language/Items/DualDaggerAxeSkinD: Replaces the edges of the Dual Zoren with multiple Rubedo blades.
/Lotus/Language/Items/GrineerStaffDesc: Fashioned with Grineer materials and balanced for marine infantry use, the Amphis is a traditional staff weapon that has received a monstrous makeover that enables shock damage on jump attacks. Connects with multiple enemies with each strike.
/Lotus/Language/Items/PoisonAbilityDesc: Saryn tags the target with a toxic spore that does poison damage over time. Destroying the spore will spread a viral infection to nearby enemies.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ShedAbilityDesc: Shedding her skin like a snake, Saryn leaves a decoy behind to draw fire from enemies.
/Lotus/Language/Items/WeaponPoisonAbilit: Saryn channels high levels of toxicity into her melee weapon, transmitting disease and plague with each strike that connects with targets.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ExplosiveDissolveA: Through noxious exhalation, Saryn pollutes the atmosphere with a lethally poisonous mist that corrodes all enemies in range, effectively disintegrating organic and synthetic matter instantly.
/Lotus/Language/Items/GrineerLightPistol: A full-auto pistol known as the most compact and lightweight weapon of the Grineer arsenal. Though it has a small clip size, the Viper has a very high fire rate and ultra-fast reload times thanks to a simplified magazine design.
/Lotus/Language/Items/PushAbilityDesc: Banshee emits a sonic shockwave that pushes targets in range with enough force to incapacitate or kill attackers.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CarryAbilityDesc: TEMP: Merge with a friend or foe for a duration of time
/Lotus/Language/Items/LureAbilityDesc: TEMP: Place a lure to distract enemies, explodes upon taking enough damage
/Lotus/Language/Items/ReturnAbilityDesc: TEMP: Enemies return to the position they were when the ability was cast after a delay
/Lotus/Language/Items/SonarAbilityDesc: Using acoustic location, Banshee's Sonar power finds and tracks enemies, and exposes critical weak spots to everyone in your squad.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SilenceAbilityDesc: Using Silence on unaware enemies will limit their perceptions and tactical response to gunfire and Warframe attacks.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SoundquakeAbilityD: Channeling all of her acoustic energy into the environment, Banshee uses ultrasonic reverberations to violently shake the ground.
/Lotus/Language/Items/DecreeDesc: Using sonic attacks and acoustic target detection, Banshee is well suited for stealth gameplay and is capable of filling both attack and support roles.
/Lotus/Language/Items/DethCubePowerSuitS:
With 'Swift Deth' and 'Vaporize' as default precepts, Dethcube acts exactly as advertised, as a badass cube of 'deth'. Comes loaded with Deth Machine Rifle weapon.

Note: This item requires two open slots.
/Lotus/Language/Items/WyrmPowerSuitStore:
With 'Warrior' and 'Crowd Dispersion' as default Precepts, Wyrm is a highly offensive Sentinel. Wyrm also comes with a laser rifle.

Note: This item requires two open slots.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ShadePowerSuitStor:
With 'Revenge' and 'Ghost' as default Precepts, Shade is well suited for stealth gameplay. Shade also comes with a burst laser pistol.

Note: This item requires two open slots.
/Lotus/Language/Items/DualDaggerDesc: These matching stilettos have increased attack speed and can unleash a flurry of multi-hit attacks.
/Lotus/Language/Items/DualEtherDaggerDes: A shorter version of the Ether blade that allows for a more focused attack on a single target.
/Lotus/Language/Items/VIPPistolDesc: A special version of the standard Lato pistol with a slower fire rate but offering higher accuracy and damage values. The Lato Vandal has been customized by the Tenno with a blue-green metallic finish and Lotus branding on the grips.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BurstLaserPistolSt: Fires a small burst of lasers.
/Lotus/Language/Items/LaserRifleStoreIte: A laser rifle developed by reverse-engineering Corpus technology.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CoolantLeakStoreIt: Sentinel has a small freeze aura, slowing incoming enemies.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CrowdDispersionSto: Unleashes radial stun damage when multiple enemies are nearby.
/Lotus/Language/Items/GhostStoreItemDesc: Cloaks owner when enemies are close. The cloak is disrupted if owner attacks.
/Lotus/Language/Items/GuardianStoreItemD: Boosts owner's shield when it runs out.
/Lotus/Language/Items/RegenStoreItemDesc: If Sentinel is killed he will regenerate once.
/Lotus/Language/Items/RevengeStoreItemDe: Sentinel will not attack an enemy unless that enemy has attacked the Sentinel's master.
/Lotus/Language/Items/RevivePlayerStoreI: Sentinel will revive its owner when downed. Sentinel dies at the end of the revive.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SanctuaryStoreItem: Creates a shield around the player when they are reviving fallen allies.
/Lotus/Language/Items/WarriorStoreItemDe: Sentinel will attack first visible enemy in range.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SwiftDethStoreItem: Sentinel will attack first visible enemy in range.
/Lotus/Language/Items/VaporizeStoreItemD: Sentinel will deal high damage to an enemy that gets too close.
/Lotus/Language/Items/LightGlaiveDesc: Dating back to the time of the first Tenno, the Glaive is a uniquely deadly weapon. This multi-bladed disc is not only effective for melee combat; it can also be thrown like a boomerang to cut down enemies at a distance.
/Lotus/Language/Items/QuadShotgunDesc: The Hek is a powerful shotgun that fires its shots with a tight spread, making it efficient at medium range as long as its strong recoil is properly managed.
/Lotus/Language/Items/HuntingBowDesc: Based on one of the world's oldest weapon designs, this Tenno-crafted weapon can be used both in stealth and in open combat. The Paris uses a chargeable magnetic field to launch arrows capable of impaling enemies to walls.
/Lotus/Language/Items/StalkerBowDesc: Dread is the calling card of The Stalker. It fires arrows that can decapitate.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FusionPartDesc: Consumed in the fusion process to power up existing Mods.
/Lotus/Language/Items/MysticFusionPartDe: Consumed in the fusion process to power up existing Mods. A single Mystic Core will instantly fuse a Mod to its maximum capacity without credit cost.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CommonUpgradePackD: Roll the dice to get a 5 pack of mods.
/Lotus/Language/Items/UncommonUpgradePac: Roll the dice to get a 5 pack of mods, with one guaranteed Uncommon or better.
/Lotus/Language/Items/PremiumUncommonUpg: Roll the dice to get a 5 pack of mods, with two guaranteed Uncommon or better.
/Lotus/Language/Items/RareUpgradePackDes: Roll the dice to get a 5 pack of mods, with one guaranteed Rare.
/Lotus/Language/Items/PremiumRareUpgrade: Roll the dice to get a 5 pack of mods, with two guaranteed Rare.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CommonFusionPackDe:
Three Fusion Cores. 

One Fusion Core has a chance to be Rare.
/Lotus/Language/Items/UncommonFusionPack: Roll the dice to get a 5 pack of randomly upgraded Fusion Cores, with one guaranteed Uncommon or better.
/Lotus/Language/Items/PremiumUncommonFus:
Three Fusion Cores.

Two Fusion Cores have a chance to be Rare.

One Fusion Core is guaranteed Uncommon.
/Lotus/Language/Items/RareFusionPackDesc: Roll the dice to get a 5 pack of randomly upgraded Fusion Cores, with one guaranteed RARE.
/Lotus/Language/Items/PremiumRareFusionP:
Three Fusion Cores. 

Two Fusion Cores have a chance to be Rare.

One Fusion Core is guaranteed Rare.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SarynPackDesc: Get Saryn and all of her favourite gear.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ColorPackDesc: A fine selection of color palettes.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ColorPackBDesc: A fine selection of color palettes.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BansheePackDesc: Get Banshee and all of her favourite gear.
/Lotus/Language/Items/StealthPackDesc: The best gear for eliminating your enemies silently
/Lotus/Language/Items/DoubleAffinityPack: Dual Ether and the dual-wielded Afuris in one special weekend package. Add in a bonus Affinity Booster to double the speed of leveling them up.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SarynDefaultHelmet: The standard issue helmet for the Saryn warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SarynAltHelmetDesc: Hemlock Helmet for the Saryn Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcaneSarynAltHelm: Hemlock increases movement speed with a reduction to max health
/Lotus/Language/Items/BansheeDefaultHelm: The standard issue helmet for the Banshee warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BansheeAltHelmetDe: Reverb Helmet for the Banshee Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcaneBansheeAltHe: Reverb grants max energy boost with a reduction to health
/Lotus/Language/Items/BeamWeaponDesc: Therma is a short range weapon that deals a constant stream of damage.
/Lotus/Language/Items/EnergyRifleDesc: The DERA is a repeater that fires super-heated plasma.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BowModConvertAmmoD: Convert unused ammo drops into Arrows
/Lotus/Language/Items/PistolModConvertAm: Convert unused ammo drops into Pistol Ammo.
/Lotus/Language/Items/RifleModConvertAmm: Convert unused ammo drops into Rifle Ammo.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ShotgunModConvertA: Convert unused ammo drops into Shotgun Ammo.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SniperModConvertAm: Convert unused ammo drops into Sniper Ammo.
/Lotus/Language/Items/WarframeModCasting: Improves casting speed on Warframe abilities if applicable.
/Lotus/Language/Items/WarframeModFalling: Create seismic shockwaves from heavy landings to knock foes off their feet.
/Lotus/Language/Items/WarframeModKnockdo: Quicker recovery after being knocked down
/Lotus/Language/Items/WarframeModLootRad: Highlights mods through the environment as well as the minimap
/Lotus/Language/Items/WarframeModPickupB: Health pickups gain additional Energy. Energy pickups gain additional Health.
/Lotus/Language/Items/UniqueWeaponModExp: Improves the blast radius of the Ignis and Ogris.
/Lotus/Language/Items/GrineerHeavyHammer: This variation of the Hammer has 5% faster swing speed, but 10% lower charge speed.
/Lotus/Language/Items/MireInfestedSwordD: A relic from the Great Plague, the Mire Infested Sword is a brutal weapon. It not only cuts into the enemy, it infects the wounds of its victim with a toxic nerve poison. Deals poison damage on ground slam and charge attack.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ManticoreAxeSkinDe: A Heavy Axe variation that grants additional damage but with a decrease in swing speed.
/Lotus/Language/Items/KunaiDesc: Kunai throwing daggers offer a silent alternative to the traditional side arm. Perfect for assassins.
/Lotus/Language/Items/TennoGauntletDesc: A pair of mighty gauntlets, the Ankyros were designed by the Tenno for close quarters combat. What they lack in range they make up for in speed.
/Lotus/Language/Items/PetAttachmentPackA: Save some platinum when you purchase the complete first series of Sentinel accessories together.
/Lotus/Language/Items/PetAttachmentPackB: Save some platinum when you purchase the complete second series of Sentinel accessories together.
/Lotus/Language/Items/GrineerAssaultRifl: Equipped with a huge magazine and impressive fire rate, the Grakata is the preferred weapon of Grineer Lancers.
/Lotus/Language/Items/TrapperWarframeDes: The highly tactical Vauban uses his powers to create deadly traps that can zap, imprison and dimensionally crush enemies.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BounceTrapAbilityD: A deployable launch pad that can be attached to any surface. Use on enemies, squad members, or as a personal mobility tool.
/Lotus/Language/Items/LevTrapAbilityDesc: Creates an energy-based containment field in which captives are held suspended in stasis.
/Lotus/Language/Items/MagHoleAbilityDesc: Creates a whirling mass of energy that violently attracts nearby enemies, crushing their atoms into a tiny spec of matter
/Lotus/Language/Items/ZapTrapAbilityDesc: Launches a grenade that holds an electrical charge, zapping enemies that come within range.
/Lotus/Language/Items/GrineerMacheteDesc: A ferocious melee weapon crafted by the Grineer and carried by their elite melee forces.
/Lotus/Language/Items/GrineerDualCleaver: Butcher your foes with brutal blades in each hand.
/Lotus/Language/Items/GrineerSniperRifle: Built by the Grineer for their elite troopers, the Vulkar is a devastating distance weapon. In the right hands it is capable of taking down targets long before they get into attack range.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AkimboHandCannonsD: A Bronco equipped in each hand.
/Lotus/Language/Items/EtherSwordDesc: A single blade for more precision. The Ether Sword cuts so cleanly that it was considered by the Tenno to be a more humane weapon for â€˜cleansingâ€™ infested allies.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ReaperPrimeDesc: Reaper Prime is an ornamental scythe, with a blade forged from tempered rubidium.
/Lotus/Language/Items/StalkerScytheDesc: Hate is a scythe with a cruel blade, wielded by The Stalker.
/Lotus/Language/Items/StalkerKunaiDesc: Used by The Stalker, Despair throwing blades have a mono-filament edge, sharp enough to penetrate a Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/LatronPrimeDesc: The ornamental Latron Prime exploits ancient Orokin technology to get a slight damage increase over the standard Latron.
/Lotus/Language/Items/DethMachineRifleDe: Standard issue weaponry signature to Dethcube.
/Lotus/Language/Items/OrthosPolearmDesc: The Tenno forged Orthos is a rare double bladed staff. Those who take the time to master it speak of its impressive striking distance and ability to hit multiple targets.
/Lotus/Language/Items/KestrelBoomerangDe: The Kestrel boomerang is a heavy throwing weapon that can knock down enemies at a distance.
/Lotus/Language/Items/OrokinCaptureKeyAD: A Capture mission within the Void
/Lotus/Language/Items/OrokinMobileDefens: A Mobile Defense mission within the Void
A Mobile Defense mission within the Void
A Mobile Defense mission within the Void
/Lotus/Language/Items/OrokinCaptureKeyBD: A Capture mission within the Void
/Lotus/Language/Items/OrokinCaptureKeyCD: A Capture mission within the Void
/Lotus/Language/Items/DefenseEventDesc: Nothing helps getting through Defense waves like a Dethcube. Also included are some customization options and an affinity booster to make your weekend even better.
/Lotus/Language/Items/GrineerPackDesc: Use the Grineer's power and brutality against them with this special assault package.
/Lotus/Language/Items/VulkarPackDesc: One shot, one kill. Add in credit and affinity boosters to maximize your weekend hunting. This weekend only.
/Lotus/Language/Items/GrineerFlyingDrone: Fitted with cloaking technology, this Grineer observation drone collects battlefield information and supports tactical deployments.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SnipetronVandalDes: A customized version of the elusive Snipetron, with metallic finish and Lotus decal.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FireworksSingleDes: Celebrate the holiday with fireworks! Light up the sky with this single use consumable item.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FireworksCrateDesc: Want a more spectacular fireworks display to show your patriotism? Celebrate in style with this single use consumable item.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ScannerDesc: Samples a target of interest for later analysis in your Codex (25 charges).
/Lotus/Language/Items/RhinoRoarDesc: Grants all nearby Warframes increased damage for a short duration.
/Lotus/Language/Items/VorPistolDesc: Captain Vor's prized Orokin-Grineer hybrid pistol has an average rate of fire, but it has high damage and superior zoom capabilities.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CorpusLaserPistolD: While its intended design is for deep space construction, the concentrated laser beam of the Spectra is highly effective against organic and synthetic enemies.
/Lotus/Language/Items/GrineerDoubleBarre: Sobek is a rapid-firing Grineer shotgun that has reduced damage per shot but boasts extra large clip capacity.
/Lotus/Language/Items/TennoShurikenDesc: As an alternative to Kunai, these Tenno throwing stars do less damage but they come with expanded ammo capacity and a higher rate of fire.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AntiMatterDesc: Nova uses electromagnetic energy to contain and control highly volatile antimatter that fuels her abilities.
/Lotus/Language/Items/DropAbilityDesc: Launches a contained particle of antimatter that will detonate upon collision.
/Lotus/Language/Items/MolecularPrimeAbil: Primes all enemies in a radius with volatile anti-matter.
/Lotus/Language/Items/WormHoleAbilityDes: Creates a wormhole allowing instantaneous travel.
/Lotus/Language/Items/NullstarAbilityDes: Creates anti-matter particles that orbit Nova and seek nearby targets.

/Lotus/Language/Items/PrimePolearmDesc: Orthos Prime is an ancient Orokin martial weapon, forged from the purest rubidium making it extremely light-weight.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FangPrimeDesc: A set of ceremonial daggers from the Orokin era, the Fang Prime's blades resonate violently as they strike. This allows them to pierce hardened materials like armor with ease.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BratonPrimeDesc: A classic Orokin weapon, Braton Prime features modified damage levels and a larger magazine over the standard model.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ParisPrimeDesc: Discovered deep inside an ancient Orokin derelict, the Paris Prime increases the kinetic energy of any bolt it fires, dealing more damage than its more common counterpart.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BroncoPrimeDesc: Infused with rare Orokin alloys, the Bronco Prime is a highly efficient weapon, trading an increased clip size and damage for a lower rate of fire.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SentinelMaskGunhea: A mask attachment for your sentinel pet.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AlloyPlateStoreOve:
Carbon steel plates used to reinforce Grineer armor.
This bundle of 1500 Alloy Plates can be used for crafting items in your Foundry.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CircuitsStoreOverr:
Various electronic components.
This bundle of 1500 Circuits can be used for crafting items in your Foundry.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SalvageStoreOverri:
High value metals collected from war salvage.
This bundle of 3000 Salvage can be used for crafting items in your Foundry.
/Lotus/Language/Items/NanosporesStoreOve:
Fibrous technocyte tumour. Handle Infested tissue with caution.
This bundle of 1500 Nano Spores can be used for crafting items in your Foundry.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FerriteStoreOverri:
Alloy pellets used in Grineer manufacturing.
This bundle of 3000 Ferrite can be used for crafting items in your Foundry.
/Lotus/Language/Items/RubedoStoreOverrid:
A jagged crystalline ore. Gives off radiant energy.
This bundle of 450 Rubedo can be used for crafting items in your Foundry.
/Lotus/Language/Items/PolymerBundleStore:
A hard, thermoplastic casing. Manufactured by Corpus.
This bundle of 300 Polymer Bundles can be used for crafting items in your Foundry.
/Lotus/Language/Items/PlastidsStoreOverr:
A disgusting nanite-infested tissue mass.
This bundle of 300 Plastids can be used for crafting items in your Foundry.
/Lotus/Language/Items/NeurodeStoreOverri:
Implanted neural-link for controlling augmentations. Grineer design.
This bundle of 1 Neurode can be used for crafting items in your Foundry.
/Lotus/Language/Items/GalliumStoreOverri:
Soft metal used in microelectronics and energy weapons.
This bundle of 1 Gallium can be used for crafting items in your Foundry.

Intercepted encrypted fragment of Grineer communications.
This bundle of 1 Tethra Data Fragment can be used for crafting items in your Foundry.
/Lotus/Language/Items/MorphicStoreOverri:
An amorphous solid. Possibly Orokin technology.
This bundle of 1 Morphic can be used for crafting items in your Foundry.
/Lotus/Language/Items/OrokinCellStoreOve:
Ancient energy cell from the Orokin era.
This bundle of 1 Orokin Cell can be used for crafting items in your Foundry.
/Lotus/Language/Items/OxiumAlloyStoreOve:
Oxium is a rare lighter than air alloy of Orokin origin.
This bundle of 300 Oxium can be used for crafting items in your Foundry.
/Lotus/Language/Items/NeuralSensorStoreO:
Biotech sensor organ harvested from Infested entities.
This bundle of 1 Neural Sensor can be used for crafting items in your Foundry.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ControlModuleStore:
Autonomy processor for Robotics. A Corpus design.
This bundle of 1 Control Module can be used for crafting items in your Foundry.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ChemFragmentStoreO: This bundle of 1 Detonite Ampule can be used for crafting items in your Foundry.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BioFragmentStoreOv: This bundle of 1 Mutagen Sample can be used for crafting items in your Foundry.
/Lotus/Language/Items/EnergyFragmentStor: This bundle of 1 Fieldron Sample can be used for crafting items in your Foundry.
/Lotus/Language/Items/NovaDefaultHelmetD: The standard issue helmet for the Nova Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/MaleS2HelmetPackDe: A series 2 helmet for Excalibur, Frost, Loki, Rhino, Ash, Vauban, and Volt Warframes!
/Lotus/Language/Items/FemaleS2HelmetPack: A series 2 helmet for Banshee, Ember, Nyx, Mag, Saryn, Trinity and Nova!
/Lotus/Language/Items/ClanEmblemDesc: An insignia that projects a holographic image of the clan emblem. Requires your clan's Warlord to upload an image of the clan emblem.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AllianceEmblemDesc: An insignia that projects a holographic image of your alliance emblem. Requires a Warlord in the clan that created the alliance to upload an image of the alliance emblem.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SlingStoneEmblemDe: An insignia awarded to the Tenno Elite who proved themselves during Operation Sling-Stone.
/Lotus/Language/Items/StableCorruptorDes: Injected into a Fomorian Reactor this corruptor will imbalance the fuels. Critically imbalanced reactors will eventually implode, destroy the ship. Slow but effective, recommended for Solo Tenno.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AlphaCorruptorDesc: Inert on its own this corruptor is highly effective if mixed with its Beta counterpart. Properly mixed, these will destabilize Fomorian Reactors much faster than their Stable counterparts. This volatile item cannot be simultaneously equipped with Beta Corruptors. Recommended for Tenno operating as a team.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BetaCorruptorDesc: Inert on its own this corruptor is highly effective if mixed with its Alpha counterpart. Properly mixed, these will destabilize Fomorian Reactors much faster than their Stable counterparts. This volatile item cannot be simultaneously equipped with Alpha Corruptors. Recommended for Tenno operating as a team.
/Lotus/Language/Items/TennoRevolverDesc: Steady and reliable, the Vasto revolver combines speed and power for a classic gunslinger feel.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ModFuserDesc: Consume 4 mods to generate a new random artifact.
/Lotus/Language/Items/LeaderBadgeGhostDe: Designates the wearer as the highest ranking soldier amongst Ghost-Tier Clans this era.
/Lotus/Language/Items/LeaderBadgeShadowD: Designates the wearer as the highest ranking soldier amongst Shadow-Tier Clans this era.
/Lotus/Language/Items/LeaderBadgeStormDe: Designates the wearer as the highest ranking soldier amongst Storm-Tier Clans this era.
/Lotus/Language/Items/LeaderBadgeMountai: Designates the wearer as the highest ranking soldier amongst Mountain-Tier Clans this era.
/Lotus/Language/Items/LeaderBadgeMoonDes: Designates the wearer as the highest ranking soldier amongst Moon-Tier Clans this era.
/Lotus/Language/Items/EventDoubleAffinit: All Tenno acquire affinity at double the rate.
/Lotus/Language/Items/EventDoubleCredits: All Tenno acquire credits at double the rate.
/Lotus/Language/Items/GrineerAkimboPisto: Designed as a pair, these Grineer sidearms fire projectiles at a slower rate but with greater force and accuracy.
/Lotus/Language/Items/GrineerSawbladeGun: The MITER launches high velocity saw blades, tearing apart anyone unfortunate enough to be in their path.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CorpusVoidCipherDe: A cipher used to decode Corpus intel. Crafting component required to create a CORPUS VOID KEY
/Lotus/Language/Items/CorpusVoidDatamass: A Corpus datamass containing encrypted intel. Crafting component required to create a CORPUS VOID KEY
/Lotus/Language/Items/CorpusVoidKeyDesc: Corpus Scouts are hiding in the Void. Use this key to find their ships and hunt them down!
/Lotus/Language/Items/GrineerCamoSkinBun: A desert camouflage skin pack for your Grineer arsenal. Contains 7 weapon skins.
/Lotus/Language/Items/GrineerCamoGorgonD: Desert camouflage skin for the Gorgon.
/Lotus/Language/Items/GrineerCamoGrakata: Desert camouflage skin for the Grakata.
/Lotus/Language/Items/GrineerCamoGremlin: Desert camouflage skin for the Gremlins.
/Lotus/Language/Items/GrineerCamoKrakenD: Desert camouflage skin for the Kraken.
/Lotus/Language/Items/GrineerCamoSobekDe: Desert camouflage skin for the Sobek.
/Lotus/Language/Items/GrineerCamoViperDe: Desert camouflage skin for the Viper.
/Lotus/Language/Items/GrineerCamoTwinVip: Desert camouflage skin for the Twin Vipers.
/Lotus/Language/Items/GrineerCamoVulkarD: Desert camouflage skin for the Vulkar.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CorpusVoidBadgeDes: An insignia awarded to the Tenno who proved themselves during Arid Fear event.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SurvivalEventBadge: An insignia awarded to the Tenno who proved themselves during Survival event.
/Lotus/Language/Items/NecroDesc: Nekros uses his dark powers to manipulate his enemies, both living and dead.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SoulPunchAbilityDe: A blow so powerful, it turns the enemy's very soul into a deadly projectile, damaging all in its path.
/Lotus/Language/Items/TerrorTotemAbility: Cast fear into the hearts of nearby enemies, causing them to run away in terror.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SearchTheDeadAbili: Forces fallen enemies around you to drop additional loot.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CloneTheDeadAbilit: Summon shadow versions of vanquished enemies to fight alongside you for a short period.
/Lotus/Language/Items/PaladinDesc: Equally adept at healing friends or striking down the enemy. Oberon embodies the balance Tenno are sworn to uphold.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SmiteAbilityDesc: Focuses deadly energy within a target and then projects it outwards, damaging both the target and surrounding enemies.
/Lotus/Language/Items/StairwayToHeavenAb: Sanctifies the ground before Oberon with righteous fire, inflicting damage to any enemy that stands in the flames.
/Lotus/Language/Items/RegenerationAbilit: Healing waves of energy flow outward from Oberon to his allies, regenerating health over time.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ReckoningAbilityDe: Quickly lifts enemies into the air and then hurls them down with conviction. Enemies who succumb to this power have a chance to spawn a Health Sphere.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FoundersBadgeDisci: This badge signifies the wearer as being a Disciple within the Tenno ranks.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FoundersBadgeHunte: This badge signifies the wearer as being a Hunter within the Tenno ranks.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FoundersBadgeMaste: This badge signifies the wearer as being a Master within the Tenno ranks.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FoundersBadgeGrand: This badge signifies the wearer as being a Grand Master within the Tenno ranks.
/Lotus/Language/Items/HindDesc: A powerful mid-range rifle used by Grineer shock troops, the Hind fires in five round bursts.

/Lotus/Language/Items/DualVastosDesc: Vasto revolvers equipped in each hand.
/Lotus/Language/Items/EtherScytheDesc: With a blade forged from the same material as the Ether Sword, the Ether Reaper delivers quick death to its victims.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CronusPrimeDesc: The Dakra Prime is a Tenno forged weapon, crafted during the time of the Orokin. It is renowned for speed, power and the ability to hit multiple targets.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BoarPrimeDesc: One of the finest examples of Tenno craftsmanship, the Boar Prime offers a higher fire rate and clip size with a slight decrease in per-shot damage.
/Lotus/Language/Items/InfestedRifleDesc: Powered by a bio-chemical reaction, the infested Synapse rifle fries its targets with a steady stream of electricity.
/Lotus/Language/Items/InfestedPistolDesc: A living weapon, the infested Embolist pistol kills its victims with an acidic venomous gas.
/Lotus/Language/Items/InfestedDualAxeDes: The fast and brutal Dual Ichor axes will quickly tear through enemies with a high probability of inflicting critical damage.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CarrierSentinelDes:
With 'Striker' and 'Vacuum' as default Precepts, Carrier is a seeker Sentinel. Carrier also comes with a shotgun weapon.

Note: This item requires two open slots.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CarrierPrimaryPrec: Carrier will attack first visible enemy in range.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ItemVacuumStoreIte: Detects and collects items throughout the room for its master, including mods.
/Lotus/Language/Items/DjinnSentinelDesc:
With 'Thumper' and 'Fatal Attraction' as default Precepts, Djinn is a combat Sentinel. Djinn also comes with a poison dart weapon.
Note: This item requires two open slots.
/Lotus/Language/Items/DjinnPrimaryPrecep: Djinn will attack first visible enemy in range.
/Lotus/Language/Items/DjinnSecondaryPrec: Lures enemies near so it can cover them in an acidic burst.
/Lotus/Language/Items/OrokinSurvivalKey1: A Survival mission within the Void
/Lotus/Language/Items/OrokinSurvivalKey2: A Survival mission within the Void
/Lotus/Language/Items/OrokinSurvivalKey3: A Survival mission within the Void
/Lotus/Language/Items/OrokinDerelictExte: An Exterminate mission on board an Orokin Derelict ship
/Lotus/Language/Items/OrokinDerelictBoss: An Assassination mission on board an Orokin Derelict ship
/Lotus/Language/Items/HekKeyDesc: Raid Earth and Assassinate Councilor Vay Hek
/Lotus/Language/Items/OrokinDerelictDefe: An Endless Defense mission on board an Orokin Derelict ship
/Lotus/Language/Items/OrokinDerelictCapt: A Capture mission on board an Orokin Derelict ship
/Lotus/Language/Items/OrokinDerelictSurv: A Survival mission on board an Orokin Derelict ship
/Lotus/Language/Items/NekrosAraknidHelme: The Raknis helmet provides a terrifying visage for your Nekros Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/EnergyScarfDesc: A traditional Tenno garment, this Syandana is woven from ancient, Orokin synthetic thread.
/Lotus/Language/Items/RazorScarfDesc: The Syandana is a traditional Tenno garment. This variation was often worn during Tenno ceremonies.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SentinelBioWeaponD: Standard issue weapon for Djinn Sentinel. Fires poisonous projectiles.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SentinelShotgunDes: Standard issue weapon for Carrier Sentinel. Fires shotgun rounds.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SentinelGlaiveWeap: Standard weapon for Helios Sentinel, throws glaives (TEMP)
/Lotus/Language/Items/TennoAssaultRifleD: Accuracy coupled with a massive clip makes the Soma assault rifle a formidable weapon.
/Lotus/Language/Items/Update10PackDesc: This bundle features some of the deadliest items from Update 10, including the Nekros Warframe and the Carrier Sentinel, both courtesy of the Design Council. Also included is Soma, the new Tenno Assault Rifle and an Ether Reaper, the perfect companion blade for your Nekros Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/SingleKamaDesc: The Kama is a Tenno style hatchet, capable of making short work of any foe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/YomoSyandanaDesc: A traditional garment, popular with high ranking Tenno.
/Lotus/Language/Items/HenruSyandanaDesc: In the Orokin era, only the Tenno were permitted to wear the Henru Syandana
/Lotus/Language/Items/NecroFeaturedDescr: Explore your dark side with the new Nekros Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/TennoArFeaturedDes: Deadly and elegant. Unload a curtain of steel death with this high-caliber, Tenno Assault Rifle.
/Lotus/Language/Items/Update10BundleFeat: Get Nekros and the deadliest weapons from Update 10, all in one place

/Lotus/Language/Items/GrineerHandCannonD: Simple but powerful. The semi-automatic Brakk hand cannon delivers a lot of punch in a small package.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CorpusHandCannonDe: The sleek lines of the Detron conceal its ferocious nature. The hand cannon's semi-automatic action takes down enemies with speed and efficiency.
/Lotus/Language/Items/VaultRaiderPackDes: The perfect equipment for Tenno seeking the mysterious Orokin Vaults

/Lotus/Language/Items/CorpusPunchKickWea: The Obex system multiplies the kinetic energy of a Tenno's kicks and punches, delivering devastating blows to any target.

/Lotus/Language/Items/BerserkerDesc: Forged in the labs of the Zanuka project, the original Valkyr was subject to cruel experiments, leaving her scarred, angry and frighteningly adept at killing.
/Lotus/Language/Items/GrappleHookAbility: Valkyr hurls forth a hook. If it hits an enemy, she pulls them to her. If it hits terrain, she pulls herself to the hook's location.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BerserkerNobleAnim: The Noble Animation Set for Valkyr.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BerserkerAgileAnim: The Agile Animation Set for Valkyr.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BerserkerScreamAbi: Valkyr lets out a rallying cry that bolsters her allies melee speed while slowing down nearby enemies.

/Lotus/Language/Items/LastStandAbilityDe: Valkyr is imbued with energy and becomes a ball of viscious rage, capable of unleashing a torrent of deadly claw attacks on unsuspecting foes.

/Lotus/Language/Items/BerserkerTubesDesc: Remnants of the bonds that restrained the original Valkyr during her time in 'the lab'. A reminder to never forget the torment.

/Lotus/Language/Items/PrimeBurstonDesc: Once thought lost to the ages, attempts to reengineer the Burston Prime never fully replicated this weapon's power and agility.

/Lotus/Language/Items/RedAntitoxinDesc: This is a mildly effective antitoxin.

/Lotus/Language/Items/InfestedDartPistol: The Tysis pistol spits out caustic darts that corrode their victims from within.

/Lotus/Language/Items/CorpusUMPDesc: Drawing from its huge quad-chambered clip, the Tetra is capable of unleashing a sustained barrage of lethal energy bolts.

/Lotus/Language/Items/AkmagnusDesc: Twice the ammo and twice the stopping power of a single Magnus.

/Lotus/Language/Items/GLARifleDesc: With pinpoint accuracy, the Grinlok lever-action repeating rifle can easily find the soft spot on any target.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BoltorPrimeDesc: Fires Orokin designed bolts that are faster and sharper but with reduced range.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AnkyrosPrimeDesc: This Orokin variation of the Ankyros is superior to its successor in every way.
/Lotus/Language/Items/StickyBombDesc: The remotely triggered Castanas quietly deliver a lethal dose of electricity to unsuspecting enemies.

/Lotus/Language/Items/WarframeSkinOberon: The Immortal skin for the Oberon Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/PrimeDualBroncosDe: Used together, these Orokin pistols feed off each other, inflicting greater damage with an enhanced chance for inducing elemental effects on targets.

/Lotus/Language/Items/AdvancedUcResource:
The Distilling Extractor Prime has an increased chance of acquiring uncommon and rare resources.

Deploy this Extractor on a planet to collect large amounts of resources. It must be emptied regularly and monitored for damage.

The Distilling Extractor has an increased chance of acquiring uncommon and rare resources.

Deploy this Extractor on a planet to collect resources. It must be emptied regularly and monitored for damage.
/Lotus/Language/Items/RhinoPrimeDesc: Takes Rhino's ground-shaking abilities to the next level with altered mod polarities that offer greater customization.
/Lotus/Language/Items/NoruPrimeSyandanaD: A relic from another time, this syandana is a highly ornamental and prized garment.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ShipyardEventBadge: An insignia awarded to the Tenno who distinguished themselves during Tethra's Doom event.

/Lotus/Language/Items/GorgonWraithDesc: The Gorgon Wraith is a powerful variant of its precursor that features unique styling.
/Lotus/Language/Items/MeleePetDesc: With 'Investigator' as its unique Precept and 'Deconstructor' as its weapon, the versatile Helios Sentinel acts as both a lethal guardian and an automatic codex scanner.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ImperatorSyandanaD: Before the fall, the Imperator Syandana was bestowed upon only the highest-ranking Orokin commanders.
/Lotus/Language/Items/HeliosGlaiveWeapon: Causes the Helios Sentinel to attack enemy targets using pieces of itself.
/Lotus/Language/Items/InvestigatorStoreI: Allows the Helios Sentinel to scan objects and enemies it encounters. This consumes codex scanner charges.
/Lotus/Language/Items/WeaponAnalystStore: Causes the Helios Sentinel to attack the first target it sees.
Upgrading increases the number of parts the Helios Sentinel can fling at a target.
/Lotus/Language/Items/PrimeLexDesc: The Lex Prime is a powerful, accurate pistol that has a low fire rate and clip size. Very efficient at long range.
/Lotus/Language/Items/IronPhoenixDesc: Fast cutting attacks with puncture finish

/Lotus/Language/Items/ProtoExcaliburSuit:
Discovering the precise nature of this recently uncovered armored prototype has proved elusive. Initial attempts at dating point to ancient origins, perhaps even predating Orokin Empire. 

Available for a limited time only.

/Lotus/Language/Items/PiratePackDesc:
Plunder the treasures of Update 13.

Featuring the latest additions to the Market, this pack includes the new Hydroid Warframe and matching Triton Hydroid helmet, Attica crossbow and the Nami Skyla cutlass and dagger set. Also included is the Para sentinel skin for Carrier and matching Para Sentinel customizations. Rounding out this pack are 3-day Affinity and Credit Boosters.

*Note: A Carrier Sentinel is required to use the Para skin.

/Lotus/Language/Items/TidalWaveAbilityDe: Crash through enemies in a ferocious wall of water

/Lotus/Language/Items/BasicSolarRailDesc: Constructing a Solar Rail allows travel to previously inaccessible locations. All Tenno who use the rail pay tribute to the Clan who built it.
/Lotus/Language/Items/UnnamedStanceDesc: This stance needs a name and description.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AxeStanceADesc: Downward cuts with an impact combo.
/Lotus/Language/Items/HammerStanceADesc: Methodical strikes and high impact combos.
/Lotus/Language/Items/HammerStanceBDesc: Arial attacks with crowd control combos.
/Lotus/Language/Items/WhipStanceBDesc: Powerful arcing strikes with energetic flips.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ScytheStanceADesc: Far flung attacks and multi-hit combos.
/Lotus/Language/Items/PunchKickStanceADe: Lightning fast hit chains and hard-hitting combos.
/Lotus/Language/Items/PoleArmStanceADesc: Fast spinning attacks and staggering strikes.
/Lotus/Language/Items/PoleArmStanceBDesc: A blend of strong and rapid strikes with leaping combos.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FistStanceADesc: Fast, multi-hit strikes with powerful finishers.
/Lotus/Language/Items/DualSwordStanceBDe: Multi-angle strikes and deadly thrust attacks.
/Lotus/Language/Items/DualDaggerStanceAD: Strong, focused attacks with multi-hit spins.
/Lotus/Language/Items/MacheteStanceADesc: Steady chopping strikes with focused damage.
/Lotus/Language/Items/PSIVColorPickerDes: Unlocks additional color options for Warframe customization.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AvatarPirateBright: An profile icon depicting Hydroid on a bright background.

/Lotus/Language/Items/AvatarPackPirateDe: Contains four variations of Hydroid and Triton Hydroid profile icons.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ShadeSpriteSentine: The Sprite skin customization for the Shade Sentinel.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ChainLightningRifl: The Amprex rifle fires a continuous beam of high voltage electricity that arcs among nearby enemies. This weapon excels at crowd control.
/Lotus/Language/Items/DethcubeCarbuncleS: The Carabus skin customization for the Dethcube Sentinel.
/Lotus/Language/Items/DinoSpikeDesc: Once worn exclusively by Orokin Judiciary, the Yamako Syandana is a symbol of wisdom and authority.
/Lotus/Language/Items/PaladinAltHelmetDe: A uniquely-styled alternate helmet for Oberon.
/Lotus/Language/Items/WarframeDefaultArm: Default armor set for the Banshee Warframe.
Default armor set for the Ember Prime Warframe.
